trans-unit.source: Displays a check box that allows the user to select a <see langword="true" /> or <see langword="false" /> condition.
trans-unit.target: 显示一个复选框，允许用户选择 <see langword="true" /> 或 <see langword="false" /> 条件。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主题内容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#Introduction)
trans-unit.target: [介绍](#Introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax)
trans-unit.target: [声明性语法](#DeclarativeSyntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介绍

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control to allow the user to select a `true` or `false` state.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控制选项可允许用户选择`true`或`false`状态。

trans-unit.source: If you plan to use multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> controls, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control is an alternative control that provides convenient data binding capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 如果你打算使用多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控件是其他控件，提供方便的数据绑定功能。

trans-unit.source: However, individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> controls provide greater control over layout.
trans-unit.target: 但是，各个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件提供更好地控制布局。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET mobile Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 移动网页验证用户输入不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 声明性语法

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control to indicate whether tax is included in the calculation for a sales total.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件来指示是否总销售额的计算中包括税款。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>类。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: 表示在客户端上呈现 HTML 内容的输出流的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the HTML attributes and styles of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> control to be rendered to the specified output stream.
trans-unit.target: 将要呈现的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 控件的 HTML 特性和样式添加到指定的输出流。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method is used primarily by control developers to insert the additional attributes and styles in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> output stream for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.AddAttributesToRender%2A>方法主要由控件开发人员使用要插入的其他属性和样式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>输出流<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.AddAttributesToRender%2A>方法重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AddAttributesToRender%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> state automatically posts back to the server when clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击时 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 状态是否自动回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to automatically post the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> control to the server when it is clicked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则在单击 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 控件时自动将其状态发送到服务器，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify whether the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is posted back to the server when clicked.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于指定是否的状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件回发到服务器在单击时。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` causes a round trip to the server every time the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`true`导致到服务器的往返行程，每次单击控件时。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.AutoPostBack%2A> property to automatically post the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control to the server when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.AutoPostBack%2A>属性自动发布的状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>到服务器时单击该控件的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> control is selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当选中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 控件时是否执行验证。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if validation is performed when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> is clicked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在单击 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 时执行验证，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A> property to determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is selected.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A>属性来确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件被选定。

trans-unit.source: Page validation determines whether the input controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules as specified by the validation control.
trans-unit.target: 页验证确定与所有页上的验证控件关联的输入的控件是否为指定的验证控件传递验证规则。

trans-unit.source: By default, clicking a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control does not cause page validation.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，单击<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件不会导致页验证。

trans-unit.source: To perform page validation when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is clicked, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行页验证时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>单击控件、 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.ValidationGroup%2A> property to specify the name of the validation group for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control causes validation.
trans-unit.target: 时的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`true`，你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.ValidationGroup%2A>属性来为其指定验证组的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件进行验证。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> control is checked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已选中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate a checked state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则指示选中状态；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is checked.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>已选中控件。

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to programmatically set the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以使用此属性以编程方式设置的状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A> property to determine the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A>属性来确定的状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked" /> property changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked" /> 属性的值在向服务器发送期间更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A> property changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged>引发事件时的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A>发往服务器之间的属性更改。

trans-unit.source: This event does not post the page back to the server unless the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.AutoPostBack%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此事件不将页面回发到服务器，除非<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.AutoPostBack%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件必须保持到此事件来正常工作的服务器的发送操作之间的一些值。

trans-unit.source: Be sure that view state is enabled for this control.
trans-unit.target: 请确保对于此控件启用了视图状态。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to specify and code the handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何指定和编写处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 以下代码示例使用单文件代码模式，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 每个代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the collection of attributes for the rendered input element of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对呈现的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 控件 INPUT 元素的特性集合的引用。

trans-unit.source: The collection of attribute names and values that are added to the rendered INPUT element for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 向呈现的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 控件 INPUT 元素添加的特性名称和特性值的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is rendered and displayed using an HTML INPUT element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件呈现和显示使用 HTML 输入元素。

trans-unit.source: You can add additional attributes to the rendered INPUT element using the <xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.InputAttributes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将其他属性添加到呈现的输入元素使用<xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.InputAttributes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the collection of attributes for the rendered LABEL element of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对呈现的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 控件 LABEL 元素的特性集合的引用。

trans-unit.source: The collection of attribute names and values that are added to the rendered LABEL element for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 向呈现的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> LABEL 元素添加的特性名称和特性值的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is rendered and displayed using an HTML LABEL element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件呈现和显示使用 HTML 标签元素。

trans-unit.source: You can add additional attributes to the rendered LABEL element using the <xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.LabelAttributes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将其他属性添加到呈现标签元素使用<xref:System.Web.UI.AttributeCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.LabelAttributes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The index within the posted collection that references the content to load.
trans-unit.target: 已发布集合中引用要加载的内容的索引。

trans-unit.source: The collection posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 发布到服务器的集合。

trans-unit.source: Processes the postback data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 处理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 控件的回发数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the posted content is different from the last posting; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果发布的内容不同于上次发布的内容，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.LoadPostData%2A> method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.LoadPostData%2A>方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.LoadPostData%2A> method checks if the postback data of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is different from its previous value, and if so, loads the content and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.LoadPostData%2A>方法检查如果的回发数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件不同于以前的值，而如果是这样，加载内容，并返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件的已保存视图状态值的对象。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 加载以前保存的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 控件的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.LoadViewState%2A> method restores view-state information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> object from a previous page request that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.LoadViewState%2A>方法还原视图状态信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>对象从已保存的上一个页面请求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.SaveViewState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 控件的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to handle the event directly.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以直接处理该事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A> property changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged>引发事件时的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A>发往服务器之间的属性更改。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件必须保持到此事件来正常工作的服务器的发送操作之间的一些值。

trans-unit.source: Be sure that view state is enabled for this control.
trans-unit.target: 请确保对于此控件启用了视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 Web 窗体应用程序中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.OnCheckedChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.OnCheckedChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to specify and code the handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何指定和编写处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 以下代码示例使用单文件代码模式，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 每个代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Registers client script for generating postback prior to rendering on the client if <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.AutoPostBack" /> is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.AutoPostBack" /> 为 <see langword="true" />，则注册客户端脚本，以便在客户端呈现之前生成回发。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method when the posted data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.OnCheckedChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 控件的发送数据已更改，则调用 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.OnCheckedChanged%2A> method if the posted data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.OnCheckedChanged%2A>方法如果的已发布的数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控制已更改。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A> property is `true`, the controls that are set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.ValidationGroup%2A> property are validated.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A>属性是`true`，在中设置的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.ValidationGroup%2A>属性进行验证。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that contains the output stream to render on the client.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，包含要在客户端上呈现的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Displays the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> on the client.
trans-unit.target: 在客户端上显示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" />。

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 在页回发到服务器后，将更改保存到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the changes to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> view state; otherwise, if no view state is associated with the object, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 的视图状态更改的对象；如果对象没有任何关联视图状态，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.SaveViewState%2A> method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.SaveViewState%2A>方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态是服务器控件的属性的值的累计。

trans-unit.source: These values are automatically placed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property for the server control, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: 这些值被自动置于<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>对于服务器控件，这是实例属性的<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>类。

trans-unit.source: This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control's life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值随后会保存到一个字符串对象的服务器控件的生命周期的保存状态阶段后。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 页面生命周期概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。

trans-unit.source: When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML input element.
trans-unit.target: 保存视图状态，此字符串对象被作为存储在隐藏的 HTML 输入元素

trans-unit.source: When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.SaveViewState%2A> and modifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property for your server control.
trans-unit.target: 在创作自定义服务器控件时，你可以通过重写中提高效率<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.SaveViewState%2A>和修改<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>服务器控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef) and [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)和[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The key value used to index an entry in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 用于对集合中的项进行索引的键值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> that contains post information.
trans-unit.target: 包含发布信息的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes posted data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 处理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 控件的已发布数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> has changed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 的状态已更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> determines the posted <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A> state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> 确定已发布<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A>状态。

trans-unit.source: Raises when posted data for a control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 当控件的发送数据更改时引发。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> fires an `CheckedChanged` event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> 激发`CheckedChanged`事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text label associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 关联的文本标签。

trans-unit.source: The text label associated with the <see langword="CheckBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see langword="CheckBox" /> 关联的文本标签。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the text label associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于指定与关联的文本标签<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to programmatically get the text label associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性还可以用于以编程方式获取与关联的文本标签<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A> property to specify the text label associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A>属性指定的文本标签与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the text label associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 控件关联的文本标签的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="Right" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the alignment of the text label associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性指定的文本标签的对齐方式与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the text label appears to the right or left of the check box.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定的文本标签是否显示向右或左侧的复选框。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A> property to specify the label text.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A>属性，以指定标签文本。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.TextAlign%2A> property to display the text label to the right of the check box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.TextAlign%2A>属性右侧的复选框中显示的文本标签。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Tracks view-state changes to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> control so that they can be stored in the control's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 控件的视图状态更改，以便可以将这些更改存储在该控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 对象中。

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> 属性可访问此对象。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET automatically calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.TrackViewState%2A> method when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is initialized.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 将自动调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.TrackViewState%2A>方法时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>初始化控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

trans-unit.source: The group of controls for which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox" /> 控件回发到服务器时引发验证的控件组。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category.
trans-unit.target: 验证组允许您将在页面上的验证控件分配给特定类别。

trans-unit.source: Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page.
trans-unit.target: 每个验证组都可以独立于其他页上的验证组进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.ValidationGroup%2A> property to specify the name of the validation group for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.ValidationGroup%2A>属性来为其指定验证组的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.ValidationGroup%2A> property has an effect only when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.ValidationGroup%2A>属性才起作用时，才的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.ValidationGroup%2A> property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 当指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.ValidationGroup%2A>属性，只会验证控件且是指定组的一部分时验证<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.ValidationGroup%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.ValidationGroup%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`true`，该控件发回发到服务器时，该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件进行都验证。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。
